QuestData.Title: Good For Something?
QuestData.Description: Goblins! Hyper little busy-bodies...$b$bListen, $n. Copperclaw, our resident engineer, is insisting that he's got something useful to show me.$b$bI'm in no mood to endure his squeaky nagging. The last time I acknowledged him, he chirped on for an hour straight. It was all I could do to keep from drop-kicking him into Sindragosa's Fall!$b$bYou go in my place and humor him. Let me know if indeed he's on to anything.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sky-Reaver Korm Blackscar wants you to speak with Chief Engineer Copperclaw aboard Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: Too busy? Phooey! This baby flies herself!$b$bNevermind that. You'll do...
